sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-breadcrumb separator="/">
      <el-breadcrumb-item>{{ Name1[0].meta.title }}</el-breadcrumb-item>
      <el-breadcrumb-item>{{ Name2[0].meta.title }}</el-breadcrumb-item>
    </el-breadcrumb>
</template>

<script>
export default {
	name:"breadCrumb",
	mounted() {
    console.log(this.$router.options.routes, this.Name1, this.Name2);
  },
  computed: {
    Name1() {
      let res = "/" + this.$route.path.split("/")[1];
      console.log(this.$route.path.split("/"));
      console.log(this.$route.path);
      let routestotal = this.$router.options.routes;
      let array = routestotal.filter((item) => {
        return item.path == res;
      });
      return array;
    },
    Name2() {
      let res =
        "/" +
        this.$route.path.split("/")[1] +
        "/" +
        this.$route.path.split("/")[2];
      let routestotal = this.Name1[0].children;
      let array = routestotal.filter((item) => {
        return item.path == res;
      });
      return array;
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style>

</style>
